name: Mabeopsa
description:
Wood. Fire. Earth. Metal. Water. The legendary magicians known as mabeopsa begin their training with elemental spirits of each element, learning how their strength ebbs and flows with the day and their relationship to each other. You've just started as a novice. Can you master the five elements and join the ranks of Mabeopsa?

Features
  • Choose between wood, fire, earth, metal, and water starting decks
  • Learn new abilities and customize your deck after dueling elemental spirits
  • Select between three difficulty levels and face over 30 challenging spirits
  • Play in English, Korean, or a combination
